S.FORM: kɯki nɯ kɯɕnɯz nɯ ɲɯ-ŋu, kɯɕnɯ-ɣjɤn.
tɕe @wuxingshan @tangsengshoutu, @jiushi
tɕe @tangseng kɯ ɯ-slama ku-wum ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕe ɯ-ʁɤri nɯ /kɯmŋu/ kɯmŋu-ri-xpa ɲɤ-k-ɤrɕo-ci ɲɯ-ŋu.
kɯmŋu-ri-xpa ɯ-qhu tɕe tɕendɤre nɤkinɯ,
@tangtaizong, @lishimin nɯ kɯ iɕqha, wuma ʑo, nɤkinɯ, χpɯn kɯ-mkhɤz tsa nɯnɯ, iɕqha nɯ kɯ-cha tsa nɯnɯ,
kɯki, tɕhoz kɤ-sɤmbi kɯ-fse nɯnɯ, /juɕ/ ju-sɯxɕe pjɤ-ra ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕendɤre nɯnɯtɕu tɕendɤre, @tangtaizong nɯnɯ kɯ....
kɯki iɕqha @tangseng nɯ ɲɯ-ŋu wo,
tɕe nɯnɯ kɯ wuma skɤrma kɯ-sna ci to-qɤr ɲɯ-ŋu.
skɤrma kɯ-sna ci to-qɤr tɕe tɕendɤre, nɤkinɯ,
@xuanzang ɣɯ nɯnɯ, tɯrme nɯnɯ,
@changan nɯtɕu z-jo-sco ɲɯ-ŋu, @changan jo-tɕɤt.
z-jo-sco tɕe jo-tɕɤt ɲɯ-ŋu. (100)
tɕendɤre @tangseng kɯ, nɤkinɯ, ɯ-ʁjoʁ nɯni to-ndo tɕe, mbro to-nɯmbrɤpɯ tɕe tɕe, @changan ɲɤ-βde.
tɕe tʂu nɯtɕu tɕe maka nɯ-tʂu ra ɯ-mɤ-tɯ-pe,
/cici/ to-nɯmtɕi-nɯ, ɲɤ-nɯrmɯ-nɯ, nɯra ntsɯ tɕe, kɤ-nɯrmɯsoz ʁɟa ʑo tɕe, mbro kɯnɤ, mɯ-to-znɯna-nɯ ʑo jo-ɕe-nɯ ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕe nɯ, kɯki nɤki, sŋi nɯ, /tɯrmɯ/
tɯrme χsɯm ki iɕqha, zgoku ciz to-zɣɯt-nɯ ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕe zgoku nɯnɯre ri, tʂu nɯra wuma ʑo mɯ-pjɤ-pe, mɯ-pjɤ-k-ɤntɤm-ci tɕe, pjɤ-ndʐaβ-nɯ.
tɕe nɯ zgoku ɯ-qa ʑo pjɤ-zɣɯt-nɯ ɲɯ-ŋu tɕe,
nɯtɕu tɕe, nɯtɕu pɯ-azɣɯt-nɯ tɕe tɕendɤre,
ɯ-tɯ-ɤnɯstɯstu kɯ, nɯnɯtɕu iɕqha, srɯnmɯ ra nɯ-z-rɤʑi ɣɯ, nɤki, praʁkhaŋ ɯ-ŋgɯ nɯtɕu ʑo pjɤ-ɕe-nɯ.
praʁ kɯ-spoʁ ɯ-ŋgɯ nɯtɕu pjɤ-ɕe-nɯ.
tɕendɤre nɤkinɯ iɕqha nɯ, nɯnɯ ɬɤndʐi nɯra, srɯnmɯ nɯra jo-ɣi-nɯ tɕe,
@tangseng ɯ-ʁɤri nɯtɕu zɯ, ɯ-ʁjoʁ nɯni to-ndza-nɯ tɕe chɤ-ɕkɯt-nɯ.
chɤ-ɕkɯt-nɯ tɕe tɕe nɯnɯ ʑo pjɤ-fse, nɯnɯ ʑo tɕe tɕendɤre, nɤki,
rgɤtpu ɯ-mtɕhirme chora, ɯ-mɲaʁrme thɯ-kɯ-wɣrum ci jo-ɣi tɕe
tɤɲi ra pjɤ-k-ɤsɯ-ndo-ci jo-ɣi tɕe, tɕendɤre iɕqha nɯ,
@tangseng nɯ chɤ-tɕɤt pjɤ-cha.
tɕe nɯ, nɤki, praʁkhaŋ nɯtɕu pjɤ-tɕɤt, tɕe chɤ-tɕɤt pjɤ-cha ma ɯ-slama nɯni tɕe ɬɤndʐi ra kɯ chɤ-ɕkɯt-nɯ.
chɤ-ɕkɯt-nɯ tɕe nɯnɯ rgɤtpu nɯ kɯ @tangseng ɯ-ɕki to-ti tɕe,
"aʑo @taibeijinxing kɤ-ti nɯ ŋu-a" to-ti.
tɕe nɯʑora kukutɕu tʂu tɕe tɕe, kɯ-sɤɣdɯɣ ɲɤ-tɯ-ɤtɯɣ-nɯ tɕe tɕe,
ɯrkoz ʑo, nɤki, nɯ-kɯ-βri, nɯ-kɯ-fsraŋ jɤ-ɣe-a ŋu" to-ti.
tɕendɤre nɤʑo mɤʑɯ ɯ-ʁɤri tsa jɤ-ɕe tɕe tɕe,
nɯ mɯ-mɤ-jɤ-ɣe-a nɤ, mɤʑɯ ɯ-ʁɤri jɤ-tɯ-ɤri (280)
@qujing, @xitian @qujing ɕɯ-kɤ-βzu nɯ, mɤ-tɯ-cha-nɯ,
tɕe "nɯnɯ ju-tɯ-sɤtɕitʂi nɯ a-pɯ-khɯ" nɯ-sɯso-t-a tɕe,
nɯ-kɯ-fsraŋ jɤ-ɣe-a" to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕe kɤ-ti ta-sthɯt qhe, @taibeijinxing nɯ kɯ iɕqha, @xianhe, nɯnɯ pɣa ci to-nɯmbrɤpɯ tɕe, zdɯm ɯ-ŋgɯ to-ɕqhlɤt ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕendɤre @tangseng nɯ kɯ, ɯʑo-stɯsti ma ɲɤ-me, tɕendɤre ɯ-ʁɤri jo-ɕe tɕe tɕendɤre,
nɯtɕu tɕe iɕqha, sɯŋgɯ, nɤki kɯ-ɣɤrʁaʁ tɤtɕɯ nɯ, @liuboqin kɤ-ti nɯ ɲɤ-k-ɤtɯɣ-ci.
tɕe nɯnɯ @liuboqin nɯ kɯ @tangseng nɯ, nɤki, @wuxingshan mɤɕtʂa ɕ-pjɤ-tɕɤt.
tɕe nɯ jamar tɕe li nɯɕimɯma ʑo ɲɯ-sɤŋo tɕe nɤki,
co, nɯnɯ zgo nɯ pjɯ-sɤɣ-ɬɯ-ɬoʁ nɯ co nɯtɕu tɕe rcanɯ, (350)
tɤ-zgra kɯ-wxtɯ-wxti ʑo tɕe, mbɣɯrloʁ tɤ-kɯ-ɤβzu ʑo kɯ-fse ɯ-zgra pjɤ-tu.
tɕendɤre @woshifulaile,
"a-sloχpɯn jo-ɣi, a-sloχpɯn jo-ɣi" to-ti to-ɣɤɕqali.
tɕendɤre ɲɯ-sɤŋo-nɯ tɕe, @tangseng tɤscɤr kɯ ɯ-qhoχpa /lo/ to-k-ɤtʂoʁloʁ-ci ʑo. (410)
tɕendɤre ri, @boqin nɯ kɯ to-ti tɕe, "kɯki, nɤki, ji-βɣo nɤʑo /ma/, nɤki, ma-tɤ-tɯ-mbɣom,
ma-nɯ-tɯ-mu ma, ɯkɯki iɕqha nɤkinɯ, tɕeki zgo ɯ-pa, nɤki, pjɯ-sɤ-xɕe nɯtɕu iɕqha, zgo ɯ-pa nɯtɕu, nɤki, ɣzɯ ɯ-do nɯ tu-ɣɤɕqali ɲɯ-ɕti" to-ti.
tɕe @boqin cho @tangseng nɯni tɕe, zgo ɯ-qa nɯtɕu, co nɯtɕu pjɤ-zɣɯt-ndʑi ɲɯ-ŋu,
tɕe ɲɤ-nɤrɯra-ndʑi tɕe, pjɤ-ɣɤngi ma nɯtɕu ɣzɯ pjɤ-xcat ʑo tɕe,
nɯfse ʑo pjɤ-ɣɤɕqali-nɯ.
tu-ɣɤɕqali-nɯ pjɤ-ŋu tɕe
nɯtɕu "nɤʑo a-sloχpɯn, nɤʑo tɕhindʐa nɯ mɤɕtʂa mɯ-jɤ-tɯ-ɣe" to-ti.
tɕeri "aʑo, nɤki, ku-kɯ-fsraŋ-a tɕe, chɯ-kɯ-tɕat-a wo tɕe,
aʑo nɤ-slama tu-βze-a" to-ti.
tɕe aʑo nɤkinɯ, @xitian nɯtɕu @qujing ɕɯ-kɤ-sɯβzu cha-a" to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu. nɯnɯ tɕe iɕqha, nɯnɯ,
tɕhoz nɯnɯ aʑo /ɕɯkɤ/ ɕɯ-kɤ-ru cha-a" to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕe @tangseng kɯ nɯ pa-mtshɤm tɕe wuma ʑo ɲɤ-rga.
tɕeri ɯ-tɯ-pe ʁo ɲɯ-sɤre ri, aʑo, nɤki, nɤʑo kɤ-fsraŋ tɕhi tu-ste-a ɲɯ-ra?" to-ti.
"tɕhi tu-ste-a tɕe tu-ta-fsraŋ cha-a" to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕeri ɣzɯ nɯ kɯ to-ti tɕe,
"nɤʑo iɕqha, tɕetu zgoku iɕqha @wuxingshan pɯ-kɤ-ɕɯfkaβ ɣɯ ɕoʁɕoʁ nɯnɯ,
ɯnɯnɯ nɯ pjɯ-tɯ-mɟe, pjɯ-tɯ-phɯt a-pɯ-tɯ-cha tɕe tɕendɤre,
aʑo tɕe chɯ-ɬoʁ-a cha-a tɕe tɕe nɤ-rca ku-ɣi-a khɯ" to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕendɤre @tangseng nɯ /to/, zgoku to-ɕe tɕe iɕqha, @rulai kɯ iɕqha, ɕoʁɕoʁ tɤscoz pɯ-kɤ-rɤt tɕe ɯ-jaʁndzu kɯmŋu pɯ-kɤ-sɯɲcɤr nɯnɯ, nɤkinɯ ɲɯ-ŋu,
ɲɤ-phɯt, tɕe nɯ s-pjɤ-mɟa tɕe tɕendɤre, iɕqha nɯ,
nɯ ɯ-stu nɯnɯ tɕe, ɯ-rkɯ nɯ tɕe, pɕaʁ ci lo-βzu ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕendɤre daltsɯtsa ʑo nɯnɯ ɕoʁɕoʁ nɯ to-ndo tɕe pjɤ-ɕe ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕendɤre ɣzɯ nɯ ɯ-tɯ-rga pjɤ-sɤre ʑo tɕe, @tangseng ɯ-ɕki to-ti tɕe,
"a-sloχpɯn, nɯʑora jɤ-cit-nɯ je, kɯ-ɤrqhi tsa jɤ-ɕe-nɯ je ma,
tɕe nɯ mɤɕtʂa aj chɯ-ɬoʁ-a mɤ-khɯ nɤ,
tɕe chɯ-ɬoʁ-a khɯ" to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕendɤre @boqin chondɤre, nɤki, @tangseng nɯra, nɤkinɯ, /liuqi/
nɤki, @gongli kɯtʂɤ-kɯɕnɯz jamar jo-ʑɣɤsɤrqhi-nɯ ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕendɤre nɯ nɯ-ʑɣɤsɤrqhi-nɯ jamar tɕe tɕendɤre iɕqha nɯ,
kɯ-ɣɤŋgɯrŋgɯr ci ʑo tɤ-zgra pjɤ-tu tɕe,
tɕe nɯ tɤ-zgra nɯ nɯ-me tɕe tɕendɤre iɕqha ɣzɯ nɯ iɕqha, nɤkinɯ chɤ-mtsaʁ tɕe iɕqha, nɤkinɯ, @tangseng ɣɯ ɯ-mbro ɯ-rkɯ nɯtɕu jo-zɣɯt ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕeri ɯ-ŋga ra kɯ-me, χtɕɯrɯpa pjɤ-ɕti tɕe, nɯtɕu tɕe tɕendɤre ɯ-χpɯm pjɤ-tshoʁ.
tɕe "sloχpɯn, aʑo thɯ-nɯɬoʁ-a tɕe, nɤki, a-rmi @sunwukong ŋu" to-ti.
tɕendɤre @tangseng kɯ @sunwukong kɯmaʁ ɯ-rmi ci to-tɕɤt tɕe, χpɯn ɯ-rmi ci to-tɕɤt tɕe, @sunxingzhe to-sɤrmi.
tɕendɤre @sunwukong nɯ @sunxingzhe to-sɤrmi tɕe,
@liuboqin chondɤre nɤki,
@liuboqin nɯ kɯ /ʑara/ tɕe "to-stu" nɯ to-ti tɕe, nɯ-rca mɯ-jo-ɕe tɕe, jo-nɯɕe.
ɯ-kha jo-nɯɕe.
tɕe nɯ jamar tɕe tɕe nɯ, kɯki ɯ-sŋi kɯki, nɤkinɯ, @sunxingzhe chondɤre @tangseng ma pjɤ-me-ndʑi tɕe,
nɯnɯ ʁnɯz nɯnɯ, zgo ɯ-taʁ nɯtɕu, zgoku ɯ-tʂu nɯtɕu pjɤ-nɤŋkɯŋke-ndʑi jo-ɕe-ndʑi.
tɕeri ʁlɤwɯr ʑo tɕe ɲɯ-sɤŋo-ndʑi tɕe,
tɤfsjit ɯ-kɯ-lɤt kɯ-fse ci pjɤ-tu wo.
tɕe tɤfsjit ɯ-kɯ-lɤt pjɤ-tu tɕe nɯ jamar tɕe tɕendɤre,
kɯ-sɤnɯsɯkho kɯ-fse, tɯrme kɯ-ŋɤn nɯ, kɯtʂɤɣ jo-nɯɬoʁ-nɯ.
kɯtʂɤɣ jo-nɯɬoʁ-nɯ tɕe nɯ-jaʁ nɯtɕu ɕɤmɯɣdɯ, scapa, laʁjɯɣ, nɯra pjɤ-k-ɤsɯ-ndo-nɯ-ci.
tɕendɤre stu kɯ-mɤku nɯ kɯ to-ti tɕe,
"e, nɤʑo, nɤki, χpɯn, iɕqha nɤki,
nɤ-tʂu ɣɯ ɯ-ŋgra ɯ-spa, nɤki, laχtɕha nɯ-te" to-ti. (820)
nɯnɯ nɯ-nɯ-tɯ-ta-t nɤ tɕendɤre mɯ-pjɯ-ta-sat khɯ" to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu. (822)
"nɯ maʁ nɤ ta-sat" to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕe @tangseng nɯ pjɤ-nɤscɤr tɕe rcanɯ, ɯ-kɤrnoʁ ʑo ɲɤ-mtɕɯr tɕe tɕendɤre mbro ɯ-taʁ pjɤ-kɤtɤr-ci.
tɕe nɯ @sunxingzhe nɯ iɕqha, @sunwukong nɯnɯ lo-ɣi tɕendɤre, iɕqha nɯ,
ɯ-ro ra ɯ-jaʁ ɲɤ-sɤkɤtɕɤβ tɕe tɕe, (838)
"nɯʑora, nɤkinɯ, tɕhindʐa nɯ tɕi-tʂu ku-kɯ-tshi-tɕi ŋu, ju-ɣiɕe-tɕi??? mɤ-jɤɣ?" to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕeri iɕqha @qiangdao kɯtʂɤɣ nɯ kɯ, nɤki, "nɤ-kɤ-ti mɤ-ra, ma-tɯ-ɤrju, nɯ-laχtɕha nɯ-te,
nɯ maʁ nɤ, nɤ-ɕa cho nɤ-ɕɤrɯ ra pjɯ-rɤkɯkrɯ-j ŋu" to-ti. (900)
tɕendɤre @sunwukong kɯ, nɤkinɯ,
tɕhi a-pɯ-nɯɣme qhe nɯ ma tu-ti-nɯ mɯ-pjɤ-khɯ ma, (906)
ɯ-rna ɯ-ŋgɯ tɕe @jingubang nɯ ɲɤ-tɕɤt.
ɲɤ-tɕɤt tɕe tɕe @qiangdao ra lonba pjɤ-sat, @sunwukong kɯ.
tɕendɤre @sunwukong kɯ, nɤki iɕqha, tɕaχpa nɯra pjɤ-sat tɕe tɕendɤre, iɕqha nɯ,
"tha a-sloχpɯn rga tɕe, maka ɣɯ-ɣɤmɯ-a" ɲɤ-sɯso ri,
tɕendɤre, nɤki @tangseng kɯ nɯ sɤz ɲɤ-rɯɣne.
"nɤʑo, iʑora kɯ-nɯndʐɯnbu nɯ ŋu-j tɕe, (936)
nɯnɯ tɯrme kɯ-pe tsa tɕe, kɯ-pe tú-wɣ-nɤma ra ma,
tɯ-sɯm tú-wɣ-ɣɤsna /ma/ ra ma mɤ-pe,
nɤʑo tɕhindʐa tɕe tɯrme kɯmɤlɤxso pjɯ-tɯ-sat ŋu?" to-ti.
tɕeri @sunwukong kɯ to-ti tɕe,
"aʑo kɯ ʑara mɯ-mɤ-pɯ-sat-a nɤ tɕe nɤkinɯ, nɤʑo tɯ́-wɣ-sat ɲɯ-ŋu loβ!" to-ti.
tɕendɤre @tangseng kɯ to-ti tɕe "ʑara, nɤki, tɕaχpa pɯ-nɯ-ŋɯ-ŋu-nɯ kɯnɤ, nɤki,
nɯ-scun ɯ-tɯ-wxti nɯ, kɤ-sat kɯ-ra sthɯci mɯ́j-rtaʁ" to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕe "mɯ́j-zgɤt" to-ti wo.
tɕe "nɤʑo ki kɯ-fse kɯ-ŋɤn ntsɯtu-tɯ-nɤme pɯ-pɯ-ɕti nɤ,
nɤki, @xitian nɯtɕu tɕhoz ɕɯ-kɤ-ru tɕhi a-tɤ́-wɣ-stu?" to-ti.
tɕeri @sunwukong ɲɯ-sɤŋo tɕe, ɯ-sloχpɯn nɯ pɤjkhu pjɤ-ɣɤɲɤβɲɤβ ntsɯ ɕti tɕe,
tɕendɤre ɯ-mbrɯ lo-ŋgɯ tɕe to-ti tɕe:
"nɤki, nɤʑo kɯ aʑo, nɤki, "@xitian nɯtɕu kɤ-zɣɯt mɤ-tɯ-cha, /mɤ-tɯ-cha mɤ-cha-a/ tu-tɯ-ti ɲɯ-ŋu nɤ,
qhe aʑo @huaguoshan nɯtɕu ju-nɯɕe-a tɕe nɯ ɕti" to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕeri ɯ-ti tu-tɯ-sthɯt tɕe tɕendɤre, li sala kɯndzur ci ɲɤ-βzu tɕe, maka ɲɤ-ʑɣɤɣɤme.

ɲɤ-ʑɣɤɣɤme tɕe tɕendɤre, @tangseng nɯ kɯ to-ti tɕe "wo, kɯki ɣzɯ ki, ndɤre aʑo laʁnɯ-ŋka ci tɤ-tɯt-a qhe nɯ pɯ-ɕti ri tɕe ndɤre ju-nɯɕe tɕe ɲɯ-ʑɣɤɣɤme ɲɯ-ɕti tɕe, a-tɤ-naχpjɤt, a-jɤ-n-nɯɕe" nɯra to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕe pjɤ-jɤɣ.
